```{julia}
include("pipelines.jl")
```



```{julia}
n80h8results = runAndSaveRobustnessPipeline("n80h8")
n40h4results = runAndSaveRobustnessPipeline("n40h4")
```



```{julia}
n40h4plots = plotRobustnessPipelineResults(n40h4results)
n80h8plots = plotRobustnessPipelineResults(n80h8results)
```



Save figs to PDF if we want to use them later

```{julia}
# All figs
saveplots(results, prefix, extension="pdf") = [savefig(p, "$(prefix)-$(i).$(extension)") for (i, p) in enumerate(results)]

# Just one fig
savefig(n80h8plots[1], "n80h8plots.pdf")
```
